thought: To fulfill the user request, I need to define the required trigger and actions first, including manual trigger, aiCompletion for generating SQL query, PostgreSQL for executing the query, and Slack for sending the results.
plan: Define the manual trigger function to start the workflow.
Define the aiCompletion action function to generate the SQL query.
Define the PostgreSQL executeQuery action function to run the generated SQL query.
Define the Slack message post action function to send the query results.
criticism: Currently, no functions are defined, so the workflow cannot run. Defining these functions is necessary before implementation.
